title: The Best Movie of 2022 So Far and 10 Sundance Films You Need to Know
description:
With the virtual 2022 Sundance Film Festival wrapped, Amy Nicholson rejoins Sean to discuss their experience from the couch, the big acquisitions, and their top 5 favorite movies at the fest (:44). Then, Sean is joined by the Norwegian director Joachim Trier to talk about his critically acclaimed new film ‘The Worst Person in the World.’ (1:14:10).
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
